item.title: Azure DevOps Pipeline
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Azure CLI extensions for Devops First install azure devops extension, creat PAT token and az login from Azure Cloud Shell 1 2 az extension add --name azure-devops az extension list --query "[].name" | grep azure-devops Following Azure Official Reference to create your own personal access token - PAT. Then login to azure devops and configure the default org. 1 2 3 az devops login az devops configure --list az devops configure --defaults organization=https://dev.
